thread.title: Award Nominated Singer/Songwriter Eugene Benjamin Releases his third CD "LIFE"
thread.title_full: Award Nominated Singer/Songwriter Eugene Benjamin Releases his third CD "LIFE"

author: prbuzz.com
title: Award Nominated Singer/Songwriter Eugene Benjamin Releases his third CD "LIFE"
text:
10/19/2015 PRBuzz News Wire Washington, DC
Singer Songwriter Eugene Benjamin has just released his third CD entitled “LIFE”.
LIFE continues the narratives of Eugene Benjamin’s 2014 WAMA nominated Roots category recording PHOTOGRAPH, and evolves a step further with new themes focusing on the lives of people adorning the physical and spiritual landscape of America… past, and present.
The musical styles include a seamless blend of Acoustic and Electric based Americana, Rock, Power Pop, and a few Folk tunes recorded Old School fashion,… straight takes and no overdubs. Think Petty, Dylan, Hiatt, Springsteen, Byrds, Beatles…
Recorded by Sean Russell at Red Room in Northern Virginia, and Produced by Award Winning Producer Jim Ebert ( Butch Walker, Marvelous 3, Cowboy Mouth, Meredith Brooks) with the musical support of Jim Ebert, Andy Hamburger and Deren Blessman.
The CD photography and artistic layout, was created by Filmmaker and Photographer, Rob Benjamin. A feast for ears, eyes and soul. Each CD is hand signed by Eugene with TLC, because he loves you!
Eugene’s new CD “LIFE” is available on iTunes , Amazon and CD Baby as well as his previous releases “Photograph” and “Martha Ave”.
www.EugeneBenjamin.com
